item.title: XLUM-file format Documentation
item.description: Motivation and principles This document details the XLUM format, an XML based file format for long-term data preservation and exchange of luminescence data. The format is readable by humans and machines, and the data can be easily checked with any text reader on any major operating system. This design allows a platform-independent operation. The following documentation provides essential information on the file XLUM format and accounts for the needs for individual flexible data analysis, even with self-written software applications.
